description: Detects the creation of an executable with a system process name in folders other than the system ones (System32, SysWOW64...etc).
author: Sander Wiebing
Tim Shelton
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: System processes copied outside their default folders for testing purposes
Third party software naming their software with the same names as the processes mentioned here
name: Files With System Process Name In Unsuspected Locations
query: (event.category:file AND file.path:(/.*\\[Aa][Tt][Bb][Rr][Oo][Kk][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Uu][Dd][Ii][Oo][Dd][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Bb][Aa][Cc][Kk][Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Nn][Dd][Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Bb][Cc][Dd][Ee][Dd][Ii][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Bb][Ii][Tt][Ss][Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Mm][Dd][Ll]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Mm][Ss][Tt][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Ss][Rr][Ss][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Aa][Ss][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Ff][Rr][Gg][Uu][Ii]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Ll][Ll][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Ww][Mm]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Vv][Ee][Nn][Tt][Cc][Rr][Ee][Aa][Tt][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Vv][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ww][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Tt][Rr][Aa][Cc]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ff][Oo][Nn][Tt][Dd][Rr][Vv][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ii][Pp][Cc][Oo][Nn][Ff][Ii][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ii][Ss][Cc][Ss][Ii][Cc][Ll][Ii]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ii][Ss][Cc][Ss][Ii][Cc][Pp][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Oo][Gg][Mm][Aa][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn][Uu][Ii]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Ss][Aa][Ii][Ss][Oo]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Ss][Aa][Ss][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Ss][Mm]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ss][Ii][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ss][Ii][Nn][Ff][Oo]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ss][Tt][Ss][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Bb][Tt][Ss][Tt][Aa][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Dd][Bb][Cc][Cc][Oo][Nn][Ff]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ii][Nn][Ii]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ss][Vv][Rr]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Rr][Uu][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Rr][Uu][Nn][Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee][Bb][Rr][Oo][Kk][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Cc][Hh][Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ee][Aa][Rr][Cc][Hh][Ff][Ii][Ll][Tt][Ee][Rr][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ee][Aa][Rr][Cc][Hh][Ii][Nn][Dd][Ee][Xx][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ee][Aa][Rr][Cc][Hh][Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Oo][Cc][Oo][Ll][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy][Hh][Ee][Aa][Ll][Tt][Hh][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy][Hh][Ee][Aa][Ll][Tt][Hh][Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Rr][Aa][Yy]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Aa][Pp][Pp][Rr][Uu][Nn][Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ii][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Mm][Aa][Rr][Tt][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ee][Ee][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Mm][Ss][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Pp][Oo][Oo][Ll][Ss][Vv]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Vv][Cc][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm][Ss][Ee][Tt][Tt][Ii][Nn][Gg][Ss][Bb][Rr][Oo][Kk][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt][Ww]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Mm][Gg][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Ii][Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Vv][Ss][Ss][Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww]32[Tt][Mm]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ee][Rr][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ee][Rr][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt][Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ee][Rr][Mm][Gg][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ee][Vv][Tt][Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ii][Nn][Ii][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Rr][Ss][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Rr][Tt][Nn][Ee][Tt][Mm][Uu][Aa][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ll][Aa][Nn][Ee][Xx][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ll][Rr][Mm][Dd][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Mm][Ii][Pp][Rr][Vv][Ss][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ss][Ll][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ss][Rr][Ee][Ss][Ee][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Uu][Dd][Ff][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ww][Aa][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND (NOT (((file.path:(/.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee][Dd][Ii][Ss][Tt][Rr][Ii][Bb][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Ww][Oo][Ww]64\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ss][Xx][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm][Rr][Oo][Oo][Tt]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\.*/) AND process.executable:(/.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Dd][Ii][Ss][Mm]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Ii][Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))) OR ((file.path:/.*\:\\\$[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\.\~[Bb][Tt]\\.*/ AND process.executable:/.*\:\\\$[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\.\~[Bb][Tt]\\[Ss][Oo][Uu][Rr][Cc][Ee][Ss]\\[Ss][Ee][Tt][Uu][Pp][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR ((file.path:/.*\\[Rr][Uu][Nn][Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee][Bb][Rr][Oo][Kk][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.executable:/.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ww][Bb][Ee][Nn][Gg][Ii][Nn][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR ((process.executable:/.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Vv][Cc][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND file.path:(/.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee][Dd][Ii][Ss][Tt][Rr][Ii][Bb][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd]\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Aa][Pp][Pp][Ss]\\.*/))) OR (process.executable:/.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ww][Uu][Aa][Uu][Cc][Ll][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (file.path:/.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR ((process.executable:/.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Mm][Ss][Ii][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND file.path:/.*\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\\7\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR ((file.path:/.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy][Hh][Ee][Aa][Ll][Tt][Hh]\\.*/ AND file.path:/.*\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy][Hh][Ee][Aa][Ll][Tt][Hh][Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Rr][Aa][Yy]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.executable:/.*\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy][Hh][Ee][Aa][Ll][Tt][Hh][Ss][Ee][Tt][Uu][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR ((process.executable:/.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Uu][Uu][Ss]\\[Aa][Mm][Dd]64\\[Ww][Uu][Aa][Uu][Cc][Ll][Tt][Cc][Oo][Rr][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND file.path:/.*\:\\\$[Ww][Ii][Nn][Rr][Ee][Aa][Gg][Ee][Nn][Tt]\\.*/)))))
